TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MsmqBindingElementBase extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement
Public MustInherit Class MsmqBindingElementBase Inherits StandardBindingElement

summary.span: 提供一个基类，该基类具有 和 类共有的成员。

span.span: Provides the base class with members common to the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含配置基于消息队列（也称为 MSMQ）的绑定所需的设置。This class contains settings required to configure a binding based on Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name

span.span: The configuration name of the binding.

param.span: 由于此值用于标识此特定绑定，因此应是唯一的。

span.span: This value should be unique because it is used to identify this specific binding.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ CustomDeadLetterQueue { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.CustomDeadLetterQueue : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，过期消息或未能传递的消息将在该 Uri 标识的自定义死信队列中进行发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a that identifies a custom dead-letter queue where expired messages or messages that failed to be delivered are sent.

value.span: 一个 实例，它包含自定义死信队列的 URI。

span.span: A instance that contains the URI of the custom dead-letter-queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个*死信队列*是由发送应用程序的队列管理器，可以存储未能传递或已过期的消息队列。A *dead-letter queue* is a queue managed by the sending application's queue manager that stores messages that have failed to be delivered or have expired. 使用 `CustomDeadLetterQueue` 属性可以指定自定义死信队列，而不必使用默认的系统级死信队列。The `CustomDeadLetterQueue` property allows you to specify a custom dead-letter queue rather than using the default system-wide, dead-letter queue. 指定的 URI 必须使用 net.msmq 方案。The URI that is specified by must use the net.msmq scheme. 如果 设置为 或 ，则 必须设置为 `null`。If is set to or , then must be set to `null`. 如果 不为 `null`，则 必须设置为 。If is not `null`, then must be set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue DeadLetterQueue { System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue value); };
member this.DeadLetterQueue : System.ServiceModel.DeadLetterQueue with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此绑定的 设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the setting for this binding.

value.span: 一个 值，指定要使用的死信队列（如果有）的类型。

span.span: A value that specifies which type of dead-letter queue to use, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *死信队列*是由发送应用程序的队列管理器，可以存储未能传递或已过期的消息队列。The *dead-letter queue* is a queue managed by the sending application's queue manager that stores messages that have failed to be delivered or have expired. 造成消息未能到达接收应用程序的原因包括：The reasons a message can fail to reach the receiving application include: - 事务性消息被发送到非事务性队列中。A transactional message is sent to a non-transactional queue. - 非事务性消息被发送到事务性队列中。A non-transactional message is sent to a transactional queue. - 未经身份验证的消息被发送到仅接受经过身份验证的消息的队列中。An unauthenticated message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages. - 未加密的消息被发送到仅接受加密消息的队列中。An unencrypted message is sent to a queue that accepts only encrypted messages. - 消息在传递给接收方之前过期。The message expires before the message is delivered to a receiver. - 超出了目标计算机的消息存储配额或目标队列的存储配额，或者在消息到达时目标计算机上没有可用的存储空间。The message storage quota of the target computer or the storage quota of the destination queue is exceeded, or there is no available storage space on the target computer when the message arrives. - 发送方不具有[访问权限](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96167)需将消息放入目标队列。The sender does not have the [access rights](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96167) required to place the message in the destination queue. - 附加在消息上的数字签名无效。The digital signature attached to the message is not valid. - 加密的消息不能由目标队列管理器解密。An encrypted message cannot be decrypted by the destination queue manager. - 目标队列在检索消息之前被清除或删除。The destination queue is purged or deleted before the message is retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Durable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Durable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定随此绑定发送的消息是持久的还是可变的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether messages sent with this binding are durable or volatile.

value.span: 如果此绑定处理的消息是持久的，则为 ；如果这些消息是可变的，则为 。

span.span: if the messages processed by this binding are durable; if they are volatile.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为 `true`，则消息是持久的；否则，消息是可变的。If this property is set to `true`, messages are durable; otherwise, messages are volatile. 即使队列管理器崩溃，持久性消息也不会丢失。Durable messages are not lost if the queue manager crashes. 此属性的默认值为 `true`。The default value for this property is `true`. 如果要求一次性保证（ 设置为 `true`），此属性必须设置为 `true`。When exactly-once assurances are required ( is set to `true`), this property must be set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExactlyOnce { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExactlyOnce : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定随此绑定发送的消息是否具有一次性保证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether messages sent with this binding have exactly-once assurances.

value.span: 如果随此绑定发送的消息具有一次性保证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages sent with this binding have exactly-once assurances; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`，指示消息队列 (也称为 MSMQ) 应确保，将发送的消息传递到接收的消息队列一次且只有一次。, when set to `true`, indicates that Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ) ensures that a sent message is delivered to the receiving message queue once and only once. 如果传递失败，消息发送到死信队列，具体取决于`DeadLetterQueue`属性设置。If delivery fails, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue depending on the `DeadLetterQueue` property setting. 若要将 设置为 `true`，则要求队列为事务性队列。Setting to `true` requires the queue to be transactional.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void InitializeFrom(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding) cil managed

param.name: binding
param.span: 一个绑定，包含用于初始化此绑定的设置。

span.span: A binding that contains the settings that are used to initialize this binding.

summary.span: 使用指定绑定的内容初始化此绑定。

span.span: Initializes this binding with the content from the specified binding.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxReceivedMessageSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示允许的最大消息大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum size, in bytes, allowed for a message.

value.span: 允许随此绑定发送或接收的消息的最大大小。

span.span: The maximum allowed size for a message that is sent or received with this binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入消息大于 ，则会丢弃该消息。If an incoming message is larger than , the message is dropped.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRetryCycles { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxRetryCycles : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置尝试向接收应用程序传递消息的最大重试周期数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry cycles to attempt delivery of messages to the receiving application.

value.span: 将消息传输到病毒消息队列之前要尝试的最大重试周期数。

span.span: The maximum number of retry cycles to attempt prior to transferring a message to the poison-message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个*重试周期*是一条消息从重试队列传输到应用程序队列以尝试传递给应用程序的时间。A *retry cycle* is when a message is transferred from the retry queue to the application queue to attempt delivery to the application. 若立即重试失败次数达到 指定的值，消息则被放到重试队列中。Messages are placed in the retry queue after failing a number of immediate retries as specified by . 指定重试周期数，它不包含第一次发送消息的尝试。 specifies the number of retry cycles and does not include the initial attempt to send the message. 最多会进行 (1 + MaxRetryCycles) \* (ReceiveRetryCount + 1) 次传递消息的尝试。An attempt to deliver a message is made a maximum of (1 + MaxRetryCycles) \* (ReceiveRetryCount + 1) times. 例如，如果 ReceiveRetryCount 为 0，且 MaxRetryCycles 为 1，则最多将进行两次传递消息的尝试。For example, if ReceiveRetryCount = 0 and MaxRetryCycles is 1, there is a maximum of two attempts to deliver the message. 此属性可以在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 操作系统及其更高版本上使用。This property is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnApplyConfiguration(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding) cil managed

param.name: binding
param.span: 一个绑定，包含要应用的设置。

span.span: A binding that contains the settings that are applied.

summary.span: 在将此绑定的内容应用到指定绑定时调用。

span.span: Called when the content of this binding is applied to the specified binding.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 实例，该实例包含一个 对象集合，这些对象可以是此配置元素的属性或 对象。

span.span: Gets a instance that contains a collection of objects that can be attributes or objects of this configuration element.

value.span: 一个 实例，该实例包含一个 对象集合，这些对象可以是此绑定配置元素的特性或 对象。

span.span: A instance that contains a collection of objects that can be attributes or objects of this binding configuration element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReceiveContextEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ReceiveContextEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否启用为处理队列中消息的接收上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether receive context for processing messages in queues is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用接收上下文来处理队列中的消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if receive context for processing messages in queues is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用此功能后，服务可以"扫视"队列的消息以开始处理它，而且，如果发生任何错误并且引发异常，将其保留在队列。When this is enabled, a service can "peek" a message on the queue to begin processing it, and, if anything goes wrong and an exception is thrown, it remains on the queue. 服务还可"锁定"消息以便重试时间在以后处理。Services can also "lock" messages in order to retry processing at a later point in time. ReceiveContext 提供了一种机制来"完成"消息一次处理，因此可以从队列中删除。ReceiveContext provides a mechanism for "completing" the message once processed so it can be removed from the queue. 在处理期间，将不再通过网络读取消息并将其重写到队列中，而且各个消息不会在不同的服务实例之间传来传去。Messages are no longer being read and re-written to queues over the network, and individual messages aren’t bouncing across different service instances during processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling ReceiveErrorHandling { System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling value); };
member this.ReceiveErrorHandling : System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指定如何处理病毒消息和无法调度的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specifies how poison and messages that cannot be dispatched are handled.

value.span: 一个 值，指定如何处理病毒消息和无法调度的消息。

span.span: A value that specifies how poison and messages that cannot be dispatched are handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为 时，侦听器会出错，并且会跟踪和引发一个 （它包装一个 ）。When this property is set to , the listener is faulted and a (wrapping a ) is traced and thrown. 消息会留在队列中，必须以手动方式将其移除。The message is left in the queue and must be removed in a manual way. 包含一个 ，它可用于识别相关消息并将其从病毒消息队列中手动移除。The contains a that can be used to identify and manually remove the message from the poison-message queue. 当此属性设置为 时，只是丢弃有问题的消息。When this property is set to , the offending message is simply dropped. 将此属性设置为 时，会将一个否定确认发送到客户端，并从病毒消息队列中移除消息。When this property is set to , a negative acknowledgement is sent to the client and the message is removed from the poison-message queue. 此选项仅在消息队列 (MSMQ) 4.0 中可用。This option is available only on Message Queuing (MSMQ) 4.0. 将此属性设置为 时，会将相关消息移动到最终病毒消息子队列。When this property is set to , the message is moved to the final poison-message subqueue. 此选项仅在消息队列（也称为 MSMQ）4.0 中可用。This option is available only on Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ) 4.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReceiveRetryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ReceiveRetryCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在应用程序队列到应用程序的消息传输失败时，队列管理器最多可尝试的立即重试次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of immediate retries that the queue manager should attempt if transmission of a message from the application queue to the application fails.

value.span: 队列管理器在将消息传输到重试队列前应该尝试发送该消息的最大次数。

span.span: The maximum number of times the queue manager should attempt to send a message before transferring it to the retry queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果达到尝试传递的最大次数且应用程序仍未访问消息，则会将消息发送到重试队列，以便在以后重新进行传递。If the maximum number of delivery attempts is reached and the message is not accessed by the application, then the message is sent to a retry queue for redelivery at a later time. 将消息传输回发送队列之前的时间量由 控制。The amount of time before the message is transferred back to the sending queue is controlled by . 如果重试周期达到 值，则或者将消息发送到病毒消息队列，或者将否定确认发送回发送方。If retry cycles reach the value, then the message is either sent to the poison-message queue, or a negative acknowledgement is sent back to the sender. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan RetryCycleDelay { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.RetryCycleDelay : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在尝试传递无法传递的消息时，尝试另一个重试周期之前应等待的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long to wait before attempting another retry cycle when attempting to deliver a message that could not be delivered.

value.span: 一个 ，指定在开始下一个尝试传递到接收应用程序的周期前等待的时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time to wait before starting the next cycle of delivery attempts to the receiving application.

value.span: 默认值为 30（分钟）。

span.span: The default value is 30 (minutes).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个重试周期会重复尝试将消息传递给接收应用程序（由 属性指定）。A single retry cycle makes repeated attempts to deliver a message to the receiving application (specified by the property). 如果所有尝试都失败，则会将消息放回到重试队列中。If all attempts fail, the message is placed back in the retry queue. 此属性指定在将消息传输到应用程序队列以便进入另一个重试周期之前，消息保留在重试队列中的时长。This property specifies how long the message remains in the retry queue before it is transferred to the application queue for another retry cycle. 此属性可以在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 或更高版本的操作系统上使用。This property is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] or later operating systems.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToLive { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToLive : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定消息有效的时长。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long messages are valid.

summary.span: 过了这段时间之后，消息会放置到死信队列（如果有）中。

span.span: When this time has elapsed, the message is placed in a dead-letter queue (if available).

value.span: 一个 值，它指定消息有效的时长。

span.span: A value that specifies how long messages are valid.

value.span: 默认值为 24 小时。

span.span: The default value is 24 hours.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据设计，排队的应用程序以断开连接的方式工作，因此，发送应用程序和接收应用程序可能不会同时运行。Queued applications, by design, work in a disconnected manner, so the sending and receiving applications might not be running at the same time. 因此，发送应用程序所发送的消息可能不会立即被接收应用程序处理。Therefore, a message sent by the sending application might not be processed immediately by the receiving application. 有些消息包含只在特定时间段内有效的信息。Some messages contain information that is valid only for a particular period of time. 如果未在该时间段内传递此消息，则该消息将不再包含有用的信息，应予以丢弃。If this message is not delivered within that period of time, it no longer contains useful information and should be dropped. 使用此属性可以指定在将消息传递到应用程序队列之前，应保留该消息的时间限制。This property enables you to specify a time limit for how long a message is kept prior to delivery to the application queue. 如果在将消息传递到应用程序队列之前过了此时间限制，则会将消息放到死信队列（如果有，这由 属性确定）中；否则，如果没有死信队列，则会丢弃消息。If this time limit elapses prior to the message being delivered to the application queue, the message is placed in the dead-letter queue if one is available (determined by the property); otherwise, if no dead-letter queue is available, the message is dropped.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMsmqTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseMsmqTracing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用“消息队列”（也称为 MSMQ）内置消息跟踪工具。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Message Queuing (also known as MSMQ) built-in message tracing facility is used.

value.span: 如果应使用消息队列 (MSMQ) 内置消息跟踪设备，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Message Queuing built-in message tracing facility is used; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `true`，则排队通道使用消息队列内置消息跟踪工具。When is set to `true`, the queued channel uses the Message Queuing built-in message tracing facility. 每当消息进入和离开队列管理器时，都会通过此工具将报告消息发送到指定的报告队列。Through this facility, a report message is sent to a specified report queue each time a message enters and leaves a queue manager.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSourceJournal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseSourceJournal : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应将此绑定处理的消息副本存储到源日记队列中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether copies of messages processed by this binding should be stored in the source journal queue.

value.span: 如果将此绑定处理的消息复制到源日记队列中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages processed by this binding are copied to the source journal queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果排队应用程序要保留已离开源计算机传出队列的消息的记录，则可以将这些消息复制到日记队列。Queued applications that keep a record of messages that have left the source computer's outgoing queue can have the messages copied to a journal queue. 一旦消息离开传出队列，并且接收到目标计算机已接收该消息的确认后，该消息的副本就会保留在发送计算机的系统日记队列中。After a message leaves the outgoing queue and an acknowledgment is received that the message was received on the destination computer, a copy of the message is kept in the sending computer's system journal queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ValidityDuration { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ValidityDuration : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在使用排队通道时的连接超时。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies a connection time-out when used with queued channels.

value.span: 与排队通道一起使用时，连接超时。

span.span: A connection time-out when used with queued channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 当 对某一消息过期时，如果过期是在事务处理期间发生的，则会随工作流实例一起中止用于其处理的任何事务。If expires for a message, any transaction that may be used for its processing will be aborted along with the workflow instance if the expiration occurs during the transaction.
